title: Stand alone building / Group of buildings in IT Parks with a minimum built-up area of 20,000 sq
clause_text: Stand alone building / Group of buildings in IT Parks with a minimum built-up area of 20,000 sq.ft. will also be eligible for above benefits.
section: (1) 7.8.1 For Municipal Corporations in Mumbai Metropolitan Region and Pune Metropolitan Region.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Stand alone building / Group of buildings in IT Parks with a minimum built-up area of 20,000 sq.ft. will also be eligible for above benefits.
